title: All Hat (Free Full Movie) Western.  Luke Kirby

sources.title: All Hat (Free Full Movie) Western.  Luke Kirby
sources.description:
Based on a novel by top selling author Brad Smith, All Hat is an exciting and breathtaking western tale. When Ray is let out of jail, his worst troubles are just starting.  Ray's two year incarceration was for assaulting Sonny Stanton, the arrogant son of the wealthiest stable owner and horse breeder in the area.  Full of thoroughbred racing, guns and romance.  

Directed by Leonard Farlinger
2007
Starring Luke Kirby, Keith Carradine, Noam Jenkins, Lisa Ray, 
Rachael Leigh Cook
Edited for YouTube ad standards
